values: To sigh is to breathe out loudly to show tiredness, boredom, or sadness.
Molly sighed when she looked at all the information she had to research.
n. 叹息，叹气 vt. 叹息，叹气 vi. 叹息，叹气
时态:sighed, sighing, sighs名 词:sigher
